newsitem.title: INDIA: Bomb explodes on bus in Indian capital.
newsitem.headline: Bomb explodes on bus in Indian capital.

text.p: A bomb exploded on a bus in the Indian capital on Saturday, and an unknown number of passengers were injured, police said.
A police spokesman in New Delhi said no deaths were reported. The bus was in the Samaipur Badli area in the northwestern section of the capital when the device went off.
"Some people have been injured but we don't have any other details," police spokesman Kamal Singh told Reuters. "No deaths have been reported."
The state-owned bus was travelling from New Delhi to Sonepat in neighbouring Haryana state, he said.
